actions.recommendation: Visit a general practitioner or a gynaecologists for a Pap smear and a Radiologist for a mammogram
Exercise will improve your risk for chronic illness, help reduce weight&also decrease stress and anxiety. 3 Days of 30-40mins a week recommended.
Healthy eating is important. Consider consulting with a dietician.
Tobacco use harms every organ in your body. Smoking tobacco introduces not only nicotine but also more than 5,000 chemicals, including cancer-causing chemicals. Please consider quitting.
